mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.code AS "sicmedRegisteredType.id", a.registered_fee AS "registeredFee", a.clinics_fee AS "clinicsFee", a.material_fee AS "materialFee", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.name_china AS "sicmedRegisteredType.nameChina"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_registered_type b ON b.id = a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_registered_price( id, code, registered_fee, clinics_fee, material_fee, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sicmedRegisteredType.id}, #{registeredFee}, #{clinicsFee}, #{materialFee}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_registered_price SET code = #{sicmedRegisteredType.id}, registered_fee = #{registeredFee}, clinics_fee = #{clinicsFee}, material_fee = #{materialFee}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
